title: Shadow Legacy
description: A Mysterious Past. A Forbidden Love. A Shadow Legacy.Rowan escapes certain death, as punishment for a crime she didn’t commit, with the help of Casimir—a vampire knight seeking redemption. As they embark on a perilous journey to uncover her mysterious past, they must navigate the harsh northern terrain and the electrifying passion building between them.During an attack by rogue assailants, Rowan uncovers her shocking power to control vampires against their will, threatening the hierarchy of both the supernatural and human worlds. When the chilling truth about Rowan's family's dark history comes to light and a master vampire targets her in his ruthless plot to overthrow the kingdom, Rowan and Casimir’s forbidden love is put to the ultimate test.With danger closing in, they face insurmountable odds as they battle not only for survival but for the very essence of who they are. Will Rowan sacrifice everything to save a corrupt kingdom that never gave a damn about her or become the catalyst to tear it apart piece by bloody piece?
author: Colleen   Mitchell
